answers.answer: wow my baby bearly measured 4.2 at 33wks u could possibly just have a bigger baby

I hope not THAT huge, haha! I don't have gd, and his day and I were both between 7-8 pounds, so I'm thinking my due date is off or he is going to be in the ten pound range... And I'm 5 foot 4, not built very big. Scared!
Anyone else have this happen? I'm curious about whether to expect him early or just expect a big baby

Mine lil girl weighed 5.5 at 32 weeks to she's a little big but those ultrasounds can be off by 10% I'm being induced early because of preeclampsia but otherwise u can still carry to full term they told my aunt before she had my cousin that she was going to weigh 10 lbs but she came out 8 that as 5 yrs ago though
My boy was estimated 8- 9 lbs... he weighed 5 lbs 15 oz at birth, so it's not very accurate all the time.

question: I know that measurements during an ultrasound can be off, but has anyone had a good doctor that took their time to do so and had their baby measuring big then either having a huge baby or delivering early? At 32 weeks my boy measured about 34-35 weeks and the approximate weight was 5.5 pounds. My doc will measure again next week to decide whether or not to change my due date...
title: measuring 2-3 weeks ahead?
